title: NEW Listing! Gorgeous Nob Hill Studio~ 1 Mo FREE + Low Deposit
posting_body: ['626 Powell #204', 'Studio; approx 344 sq ft', '$2295; 1 month FREE RENT (applied 3rd & 4th month of 12 month term)', 'UNIT AMENITIES', '-Beautifully Renovated Kitchen', '-Stainless Steel Appliances', '-Dishwasher', '-Gas Stove', '-Hardwood flooring throughout the unit', '-Remodeled Bathroom with shower over tub', 'Virtual Walkthrough Tour:', 'COMMUNITY FEATURES', '-Elevator', '-Pet Friendly!', 'No Pet Rent!', '$500 Pet Deposit per pet, 2 pets per home', '-Laundry Onsite', '-Rent Controlled', '-Onsite Manager', '-Managed by Brick and Timber', '-Presented by Jennifer Strongin at Bevy Homes; Lic #02144587', 'THE NEIGHBORHOOD', '-Heart of SF, Steps from Union Sq', '-Walking Distance to Trader Joes', '-Steps from Polk St shops, and restaurants', '-Easy access to freeways and downtown', 'LEASE TERMS', '-Lease: 1 Year', '-Income: 2.5 x Rent', '-Utilities are resident responsibility', '-Application Link: <URL>, App Fee: $23/ person', 'PROMOTION: 2 MONTHS FREE applied during the 3rd and 4th months of the lease term.', '$1000 Discounted Deposit on approved credit, or a one-time, non-refundable security deposit alternative.', '*Email your name and best number to reach you to Schedule a Viewing Appointment', '*COVID and shelter in place compliant in-person tours available upon request.', '*Price and Availability is Subject to Change', '*Sq Ft is estimated', '*We do business in accordance with the Federal Fair Housing Law']
